Planet.Name: Mercury
Planet.Details: The small and rocky planet Mercury is the closest planet to the Sun.

Planet.Name: Venus
Planet.Details: At first glance, if Earth had a twin, it would be Venus.

Planet.Name: Earth
Planet.Details: Earth, our home planet, is the only planet in our solar system known to harbor life.

Planet.Name: Mars
Planet.Details: The red planet Mars has inspired wild flights of imagination over the centuries.

Planet.Name: Jupiter
Planet.Details: With its numerous moons and several rings, the Jupiter system is a "mini-solar system."

Planet.Name: Saturn
Planet.Details: Saturn is the most distant of the five planets known to ancient stargazers.

Planet.Name: Uranus
Planet.Details: Uranus gets its blue-green color from methane gas above the deeper cloud layers.

Planet.Name: Neptune
Planet.Details: Neptune was the first planet located through mathematical predictions.

Planet.Name: Pluto
Planet.Details: Long considered to be the smallest, coldest, and most distant planet from the Sun.
